title: Wrongfully Leavebustered
body: So i queue up for a ranked game like normal, the game dc'd me like sometimes it will because internet isn't always reliable. It wouldn't let me reconnect and i know the problem wasn't with my internet because i was still on Discord and browsing ways to help. my account is mck1029 plz rito

replies.body:
Leaverbuster will treat everyone equally even if it wasn't intentional, because it still causes others a negative experience.  You can still use other services like Discord, but still have issues reach specific services like the game server.  

Your connection might be unstable and continue to worsen until it gets resolved.  I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this and test it in a custom game.
